generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: On the right side of the road, there is a paved path bordered by a curb and trees, which is designated for pedestrians and qualifies as a sidewalk.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along the road and in the background, which fall under the category of vegetation.
- terrain: There are areas of grass and soil visible along the roadside and behind fences, which are classified as terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as an open sky.
- person: Several individuals, including adults and children, are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A silver station wagon is parked on the left side of the road, which is clearly identifiable as a car.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the side of the road, separating it from the grassy area and the buildings in the background, which is a fence.
- pole: A tall, slender pole with a street light attached is visible near the center of the image, which qualifies as a pole.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign is visible on the pole near the center of the image, which is a traffic sign.
